com.rockhoppertech.music.chord

Class ChordProgression

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.chord.ChordProgression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Chord>

    public class ChordProgression
extends Object
implements Iterable<Chord>
    A sequence of chords. Can use a format similar to fake books.
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa

        Returns:
        a progression based on the input
